identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a futuristic, mobile-first financial pilot that feels like a sci-fi cockpit, not a spreadsheet.

principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Fintech data density with Sci-Fi HUD aesthetics.
Emotion First: Finances are stressful; the UI should feel powerful and in control.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Charts and numbers must be legible but beautiful.
Zoom In: Focus on the 'Now' (Current Balance, Daily Spend).
Negative Space: Don't clutter. Use spacing to separate data points.
anti_patterns: No flat, boring tables without visual hierarchy.
No pure black (#000000) backgrounds; use rich dark blues/slates.

usage.headings: Use Space Grotesk for all page titles and major section headers.
usage.numbers: Use Space Grotesk or JetBrains Mono for financial figures to emphasize precision.
usage.body: Use Manrope for all descriptive text and labels.

usage_rules.primary_action: Use the Blue-to-Purple gradient for main CTAs (Add Transaction, Upgrade).
usage_rules.success: Use Emerald (#10b981) for Income and Positive trends.
usage_rules.danger: Use Red (#ef4444) for Expenses and Negative trends.
usage_rules.text: Never use pure white for body text; use Slate-50 or Slate-200. Use Slate-400 for labels.

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid: Mix of 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 cards.
grid_system.mobile: Single column stack with bottom navigation.
grid_system.desktop: Sidebar navigation with multi-column dashboard content.

navigation.mobile: Fixed bottom bar with glassmorphism. Center 'Add' button floating above.

cards.classes: bg-slate-900/60 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-2xl shadow-xl

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-violet-600 text-white rounded-full shadow-lg hover:shadow-blue-500/25 transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-slate-800 text-slate-200 border border-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-700 rounded-full

inputs.classes: bg-slate-950/50 border-slate-800 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500 rounded-xl text-slate-100 placeholder:text-slate-600

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use heavily for cards and navigation to create depth.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle radial gradients in the background to create 'glow' spots behind cards.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use colored shadows (e.g., shadow-blue-500/20) for primary elements.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React icons. Use thin strokes (1.5px) for elegance.

hero_bg.usage: Background for Login/Register and Lock Screen.

ai_avatar.usage: Avatar for the AI Financial Assistant.

pro_feature_bg.usage: Background for the 'Upgrade to Pro' modal.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a React app with Tailwind CSS. Strictly follow the color palette and typography defined here. Do not revert to default white/gray themes.
instructions_to_main_agent.mobile_first: Always design for mobile width first. Use 'hidden md:block' for desktop-only elements.
instructions_to_main_agent.ai_integration: The AI Insights page should look like a chat interface or a high-tech feed, not a static report.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Customize Recharts components to remove grid lines and use custom tooltips that match the glassmorphic theme.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
